hjz_zork

Class Exit

  • java.lang.Object
    • hjz_zork.Exit

  • class Exit
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing an exit for a room in the Bork dungeon.
    Version:
    1.0, 11/05/2016
    Author:
    Hollis Pultz, John Pruchnic, Zachary Zwierko

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) static class  Exit.NoExitException
      Exception class representing when there are no exits to read from a dungeon (.bork) file.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Exit

        Exit(java.util.Scanner fin,
     Dungeon dun)
throws Exit.NoExitException
        Constructor for Exit class.
        Parameters:
        fin - The Scanner reader of the dungeon (.bork) file to construct this Exit from.
        dun - The Dungeon associated with this Exit.
        Throws:
        Exit.NoExitException - if there are no exits to read from the dungeon file.
